job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: Cloud Data Engineer  Are you an experienced data engineer looking for a new challenge? SGI is helping a respected company recruit a Cloud Data Engineer. This is a remote, contract role!  If you were already working in this IT Management role, here are some of the things you would have done this week:Create scalable ETL and reporting solutionsReview, analyse, and evaluate the scope of business problemsDevelop ETL and data warehousing solutionsEnsure data integrity, performance quality, and resolution of data load failuresCreate detailed technical specification To succeed in this data capture position, you should be proficient in HDFS, HBase, YARN, SPARK, Oozie, and shell scripting and have a background in all aspects of software engineering with good skills in parallel data processing, data flows, REST APIs, JSON, XML, and microservice architecture. You will also need:Experience in RDBMS technologies and conceptsExperience working with Teradata, Netezza, Oracle, DB2 databasesAn understanding of File Formats - ORC, Parquet, Avro File formatsProgramming/scripting experience skills - UNIX shell, Python, Perl, and JavaScriptExperience working on large data sets with performance tuning and troubleshooting Other essential attributes include knowledge of Spark, Spark Streaming, Spark SQL, and Kafka, experience working with Databricks, Snowflake, Big Query, or Red Shift and as a data engineer, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work independently. If this remote Cloud Data Engineer job excites and motivates you, please apply with SGI today. Award-Winning International Recruitment Specialists Source Group International - bring together 3 recruitment businesses within Technology & Life Sciences. As a business, we believe in doing better every day. It's who we are; it's what unites us.
